= !IsWin9x class function =

*Project:* [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit].

*Unit:* _PJSysInfo_.

*Class:* _[TPJOSInfo TPJOSInfo]_

{{{
class function IsWin9x: Boolean;
}}}

== Description ==

Returns True if a Windows 9x operating system is installed (i.e. Windows 95, Windows 98 or Windows Me) or False otherwise.

When the program is run in compatibility mode, this method may report the "emulated" operating system.

[v5.0] On operating systems where _[TPJOSInfoCanSpoof CanSpoof]_ returns `False` this method will report the correct operating system, regardless of any compatibility mode.
